name: RuneFall (itch)
description:
Controls:

  • Mouse
    • Left click runes to place
    • Right click runes to discard
    • Click rune stack to push and submit combo
    • Click side arrows to turn
  • Keyboard
    • 1,2,3 to place runes
    • S/Down Arrow to discard
    • W/Up Arrow to push and submit combo
    • A/Left Arrow and D/Right Arrow to turn

This game was made in 48 hours for Mini Jam 104, with the limitation Finite Quantity.

If the web build isn't running super well, give the executable a go!
